sections.heading: THE CAUSES WHICH DISPENSE OR EXCUSEFROM THE TUTORSHIPArt
sections.text: 292. Excuse by reason of office or function.The following persons are dispensed or excused from the tutorship by the privilege of their offices or functions:1. The Governor and the Secretary of State;2. The judges of the different courts of t
